attributes.action: Redu\e the cost of electricity for those who accept windfarms in their vicinity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those people who have a wind-farm placed in their neighborhood (whether they are willing or not to have the wind-farm)should be the ones to benefit from its installation. The best way of achieving this would be to offer a reduction in electricity charge in perpetuity of say 20%
